item.title: 2 月份美国进口价格稳中有升
item.description: 由于消费品成本上升，2 月份美国进口价格意外上涨，这对通胀前景不是一个好兆头。【原文：U.S. import prices unexpectedly rose in February amid higher costs for consumer goods, which does not bode well for the inflation outlook.】

item.title: CME 集团将推出欧洲菜籽油期货
item.description: 金融市场运营商芝加哥商品交易所集团（CME Group）周二表示，该公司计划下月推出现金结算的欧洲菜籽油期货，使用阿格斯媒体指数（Argus Media index）作为荷兰菜籽油的价格。【原文：Financial markets operator CME Group said on Tuesday that it plans to launch cash-settled futures for European rapeseed oil next month, using an Argus Media index for Dutch prices.】

item.title: 普京告诉俄罗斯企业即使西方放松制裁也不要指望完全自由贸易
item.description: 弗拉基米尔-普京总统周二告诉俄罗斯商界领袖，不要指望在西方放松对俄罗斯制裁的情况下恢复完全自由的贸易或资本流动。【原文：President Vladimir Putin told Russian business leaders on Tuesday not to count on fully free trade or movement of capital being restored in the event of Western sanctions on Russia being eased.】

item.title: 谷歌母公司 Alphabet 有史以来最大的收购案
item.description: Alphabet 将以 320 亿美元的价格收购网络安全初创公司 Wiz，这是谷歌母公司有史以来最大的一笔收购交易。【原文：Alphabet will buy cybersecurity startup Wiz for $32 billion, in a deal that represents the Google parent's biggest acquisition ever.】

item.title: VIEW 加拿大 2 月份年通胀率升至 2.6
item.description: 加拿大统计局（Statistics Canada）周二表示，加拿大 2 月份的年通货膨胀率上升至 2.6%，高于预期，原因是包括食品和某些其他商品的 GST/HST 假期结束在内的广泛增长。【原文：Canada's annual inflation rate rose to a higher than expected 2.6% in February, on broad-based increases, including the end of the GST/HST holiday on food and certain other items, Statistics Canada said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 在被报道推迟首次公开募股后，Stada 表示仍在考虑所有选项
item.description: 德国制药公司斯塔达（Stada）周二表示，该公司正在全面评估进一步持股的所有方案，包括可能的首次公开募股。【原文：German pharmaceutical firm Stada said on Tuesday it was generally evaluating all options for its further ownership, including a possible initial public offering.】

item.title: 美国 2 月份房屋开工强劲反弹
item.description: 2 月份，美国单户住宅建筑业大幅反弹，但关税和劳动力短缺导致的建筑成本上升威胁着经济复苏。【原文：U.S. single-family homebuilding rebounded sharply in February, but rising construction costs from tariffs and labor shortages threaten the recovery.】

item.title: 销售税减免结束，加拿大通胀率升至 2.6
item.description: 周二的数据显示，由于上月中旬结束的销售税减免政策推动了物价上涨，加拿大2月份的年度通货膨胀率意外跃升至2.6%，超出预期。【原文：Canada's annual inflation rate showed a surprise jump to 2.6% in February surpassing expectations as a sales tax break that ended mid of last month pushed prices higher amid an already broad-based price increase, data showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 以色列汽车初创企业 REE 将签署价值 7.7 亿美元的独家技术供应协议
item.description: 以色列初创公司 REE Automotive 周二表示，预计到 2030 年，该公司将与一家未公开的公司达成许可协议，向其提供有助于制造自动驾驶汽车的技术，从而获得高达 7.7 亿美元的收入。【原文：Israeli startup REE Automotive said on Tuesday it expects revenue of up to $770 million by 2030 from a licensing deal with an undisclosed company to which it will provide technology that helps make autonomous vehicles.】

item.title: 纳斯达克将在得克萨斯州设立地区总部
item.description: 交易所运营商纳斯达克周二表示，将在得克萨斯州达拉斯市设立一个新的地区总部。【原文：Exchange operator Nasdaq said on Tuesday it will open a new regional headquarters in Dallas, Texas.】

item.title: DTCC 计划于 2026 年第二季度提供 24 小时股票清算服务
item.description: 市场基础设施公司美国存托信托与清算公司（DTCC）周二发表声明称，该公司计划增加清算服务的运营时间，以支持2026年第二季度美国股票交易的延长。【原文：Market infrastructure company Depository Trust and Clearing Corporation (DTCC) said on Tuesday it plans to increase its clearing services operating hours to support extended U.S. equities trading in the second quarter of 2026, according to a statement.】

item.title: 欧洲刑警组织警告人工智能驱动的犯罪威胁
item.description: 欧洲刑警组织（Europol）周二警告说，有组织犯罪团伙正在转向人工智能驱动的诈骗和支付系统来瞄准受害者，这使他们能够以更低的成本迅速扩大全球行动规模，并使他们更难被发现。【原文：Organised crime gangs are turning to AI-powered scams and payment systems to target victims, allowing them to rapidly and more cheaply scale up operations globally and making them harder to detect, Europol warned on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国 Zeekr 推出首款具备三级自动驾驶功能的电动汽车
item.description: 中国的紫光集团（Zeekr Group）周二表示，它将开始销售一款运动型多用途车，该车配备的技术可以让汽车在无人看管的情况下行驶，这在智能驾驶技术大战白热化的当下将是业内首创。【原文：China's Zeekr Group on Tuesday said it would start selling a sports utility vehicle equipped with technology that would be ready to allow the car to be driven without human supervision, which would be a first for the industry as a smart driving tech war heats up.】

item.title: 斯图加特交易所下属机构获准在瑞士使用基于区块链的交易系统
item.description: 瑞士金融市场监管局（FINMA）周二表示，斯图加特证券交易所（Stuttgart Stock Exchange）的瑞士子公司BX Digital已获得在该国运营区块链交易系统的许可。【原文：Switzerland's financial market regulator FINMA has granted a Swiss subsidiary of the Stuttgart Stock Exchange a licence to operate a blockchain-based trading system in the country, the unit, BX Digital, said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯主权财富基金首席执行官称，该基金正着眼于与美国公司合作稀土项目
item.description: 俄罗斯直接投资基金（RDIF）首席执行官基里尔-德米特里耶夫（Kirill Dmitriev）周二表示，俄罗斯主权财富基金正在关注该国稀土矿藏的开发，并希望与美国公司合作。【原文：Russia’s sovereign wealth fund is eyeing the development of rare earth deposits in the country and wants to partner with U.S. companies, Kirill Dmitriev, CEO of the Russian Direct Investment Fund (RDIF), said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 货运代理公司 Kuehne+Nagel 将在得克萨斯州与墨西哥边境开设新站点
item.description: 瑞士物流集团 Kuehne und Nagel 周二表示，它将在靠近墨西哥边境的得克萨斯州开设一个新的公路物流设施，以满足美国和墨西哥之间日益增长的海关支持需求。【原文：Swiss logistics group Kuehne und Nagel said on Tuesday it would open a new road logistics facility in Texas, close to the Mexican border, to meet growing demand for customs support between the United States and Mexico.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，谷歌同意以 320 亿美元收购网络安全初创公司 Wiz
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周二援引知情人士的话报道称，谷歌母公司 Alphabet 已同意以至少 320 亿美元的价格收购网络安全初创公司 Wiz。【原文：Google-parent Alphabet has agreed to buy cybersecurity startup Wiz for at least $32 billion, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 早间竞价：欧洲股市持续飙升，美国股市趋于稳定
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，好市多正在向中国大陆供应商施压，要求他们降价
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周二援引两家供应商的话报道称，好市多批发公司（Costco Wholesale）正在向中国大陆的供应商施压，要求他们降价以应对美国的关税。【原文：Costco Wholesale is pressuring suppliers in mainland China to cut prices in response to U.S. tariffs, The Financial Times reported on Tuesday, citing two suppliers.】

item.title: 尼古拉-坦根连任挪威财富基金首席执行官
item.description: 挪威中央银行周二表示，尼古拉-坦根（Nicolai Tangen）已被任命连任挪威庞大的主权财富基金挪威银行投资管理公司（Norges Bank Investment Management）首席执行官。【原文：Nicolai Tangen has been appointed to a second term as CEO of Norway's vast sovereign wealth fund, Norges Bank Investment Management, the central bank said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 新市场和廉价 SUV 使 XPeng 季度收入好于预期
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商新鹏汽车周二预计第一季度营收将高于预期，该公司押注于推出价格较低的 G6 和 G9 SUV 车型以及进军欧洲市场。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker XPeng on Tuesday forecast first-quarter revenue above estimates, betting on the launch of its lower-priced G6 and G9 SUV models as well as its foray into European markets.】

item.title: 乌克兰顶级电信公司赴美上市，估值超过 20 亿美元
item.description: 乌克兰领先的移动运营商 Kyivstar 的母公司 VEON 周二表示，尽管唐纳德-特朗普总统混乱的贸易政策打击了华尔街的信心，但该公司仍在推进其美国上市计划。【原文：Ukraine's leading mobile operator Kyivstar is moving ahead with its planned U.S. listing, its parent VEON said on Tuesday, even as President Donald Trump's chaotic trade policy knocks confidence on Wall Street.】

item.title: 随着美国啤酒饮用量下降，大麦种植者开始担心关税问题
item.description: 蒙大拿州的大麦种植者米奇-科宁（Mitch Konen）在俯瞰白雪皑皑的落基山脉的偏远农场里打包干草和装载拖车时，逾期未还的贷款和不断增加的利息常常让他感到压力山大。【原文：Overdue loans and mounting interest payments often weigh on Montana barley grower Mitch Konen as he bales hay and loads trailers at his remote farm overlooking the snow-capped Rocky Mountains.】

item.title: 美联储会议召开前，期货市场难寻方向
item.description: 周二，在美联储即将召开会议之前，美国股指期货一直在努力寻找方向，人们将密切关注美联储就当前关税争端对经济的潜在影响发表的评论。【原文：U.S. stock index futures struggled for direction on Tuesday ahead of the Federal Reserve's upcoming meeting that will be closely monitored for commentary from the central bank on the potential economic ramifications of ongoing tariff disputes.】

item.title: 美联储会议召开前，期货市场难寻方向
item.description: 周二，在美联储即将召开会议之前，美国股指期货一直在努力寻找方向，人们将密切关注美联储就当前关税争端对经济的潜在影响发表的评论。【原文：U.S. stock index futures struggled for direction on Tuesday ahead of the Federal Reserve's upcoming meeting that will be closely monitored for commentary from the central bank on the potential economic ramifications of ongoing tariff disputes.】

item.title: 债券投资者为美国经济放缓做好准备
item.description: 考虑到美联储并不急于恢复降息，债券投资者正在为美国经济衰退做好准备，因为他们正在缩减风险敞口，同时许多投资者正在延长其固定收益投资组合的期限。【原文：Bond investors are bracing for a U.S. economic downturn, as they pare back risky exposures, while many are extending duration in their fixed-income portfolios, taking in to account a Federal Reserve that is in no rush to resume cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 金融科技公司和加密货币公司寻求银行特许以促进发展
item.description: 据半打以上的行业高管称，金融科技公司和加密货币公司正在寻求成为州银行或国家银行，以期在他们认为更有利于行业发展的特朗普政府领导下拓展业务。【原文：Financial technology firms and crypto companies are seeking to become state or national banks in a bid to expand their business under the Trump administration that they view as more industry-friendly, according to more than half a dozen industry executives.】

item.title: 美联储观察家认为资产负债表缩减很有可能发生变化
item.description: 华尔街对美联储缩减资产负债表的前景不断变化，现在再次出现了变化，一些银行和研究人员认为，美联储很有可能在本周的政策会议上进一步放缓或暂停缩减资产负债表的努力。【原文：Wall Street’s ever-shifting outlook on the reduction of the Federal Reserve’s balance sheet is once again in flux, with a number of banks and researchers now seeing a good chance the central bank may slow further or pause the effort at this week's policy meeting.】

item.title: 苹果公司在德国反垄断上诉中败诉，为加强控制打开大门
item.description: 德国联邦法院周二裁定，苹果公司对监管部门的一项评估提出上诉，要求这家 iPhone 制造商在德国接受更严格的监管，但苹果公司败诉。【原文：Apple lost an appeal on Tuesday against a regulatory assessment that opens the iPhone maker up to stricter controls in Germany, the Federal Court of Justice ruled on Tuesday, following years of debate over the company's market position.】

item.title: 奥迪权衡提价以减轻美国关税打击
item.description: 大众汽车公司周二表示，该公司旗下高端品牌奥迪正在权衡是否通过提价将美国进口关税成本转嫁给客户，并表示预计今年将就北美本地化生产做出决定。【原文：Volkswagen's premium Audi brand is weighing whether to pass on the costs of U.S. import tariffs to customers through price increases, it said on Tuesday, adding it was expecting a decision this year on localising production in North America.】
